title: Taiwan Launches New COVID-19 Herbal Medicine
description: Taiwan's center for traditional medicine has launched an updated version of its homegrown herbal treatment for COVID-19. The National Research Institute of Chinese Medicine says clinical trials show its new formula is effective against the BA.4 and BA.5 subvariants.
